Headline: Normal Green and Pink Line Service Being Restored
ShortDescription: Some Green and Pink Line trains are running with residual delays after an earlier bridge lift at the Chicago River, downtown. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Green and Pink Line trains are running with residual delays after an earlier bridge lift at the Chicago River, downtown.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are now moving and service is resuming; allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th | Temporary East-bound Reroute near 75th/Greenwood
ShortDescription: East-bound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Greenwood and South Chicago: due to,street blockage near75th/Greenwood..

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
East-bound  #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Greenwood and South Chicago: due to,street blockage near 75th/Greenwood..

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Northbound Reroute near 75th/Greenwood
ShortDescription: Northbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Greenwood, South Chicago and Cottage Grove: due to, street blockage near 75th/Greenwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound # 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Greenwood, South Chicago and Cottage Grove: due to, street blockage near 75th/Greenwood.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
